Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled performance and convenience. Given its exceptional quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value, but I understand everyone has different perspectives on value. To make things straightforward, I'm offering this remarkable product to you for $12000. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Looking forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
